overview: What do women's laughs put into play? In a context of predominantly phalocentric social, economic and historic discourses, feminist cinematographic criticism and women-directed cinema have been the political tools to claim another history of the world (and of cinema), from a feminist, liberating, irreverent, funny, disobedient perspective, and, above all, with a lot of space for pleasure.
title: La carcajada de la medusa
